lead_paragraph: What does Shirley Ann Jackson know about shipping parcels? For that matter, what does Steven B. Sample understand about mutual funds? Dr. Jackson, who is a theoretical physicist and the president of the Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute in Troy, N.Y., has served as an outside director on the board of FedEx since 1999.
snippet: When university presidents serve on many corporations' boards, governance experts say, someone is getting short shrift.
abstract: When university presidents serve on many corporations' boards, governance experts say, someone is getting short shrift.
